column2: Wal-Mart driver in Tracy Morgan crash to seek dismissal: lawyer NEW YORK A lawyer for the Wal-Mart truck driver involved in a 2014 crash that severely injured comedian Tracy Morgan and killed his friend said on Friday he would ask a New Jersey judge next week to dismiss all criminal charges against his client.
